articles.author: Bob Pockrass
articles.title: Kyle Larson crashes out of both Indy 500, Coca-Cola 600: 'A bummer of a day' - FOX Sports
articles.description: Kyle Larson’s quest to run 1,100 miles in one day was cut short as he crashed out of both the Indianapolis 500 and Coca-Cola 600.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS Kyle Larsons quest to run 1,100 miles in one day ended after 91 laps of the Indianapolis 500 when he wrecked just short of halfway through the race. 
Larson finished 27th in the Indy 50… [+3362 chars]
